channel.title: Pushover Notification :: ESP3D Ecosystem
channel.description: Pushover is paid service Considering you have pushover account (even just trial) and you already installed pushover client on you phone/PC: 1 - Go to https://pushover.net/ and connect with email and password 2 - Once connected you will be able to get the token 1, the user token 3 - You also need to generate an application token, which is the token 2 4 - The token 2 generation: 5 - Save the generate token 1 and token 2 in ESP3D, and set PUSHOVER as notification supplier
